name: Jerry
line: The trick to cereal is keeping 70% of it above the milk.

name: Beth
line: Jerry, get a job.

name: Rick
line: Uh, w-why don't you get it Jerry? you're the man of the house and you don't have a job.

name: Jerry
line: *Sighs and stands up to answer door*

name: Courier Flap
line: (In an automated machine voice) Delivery for Rick, Morty, Summer, Beth and Jerry.

name: Summer
line: *Drops spoon upon seeing the Courier Flap* Gross, what is that thing?

name: Rick
line: It's a Courier Flap, it's like the Intergalactic version of UPS but less off-putting. *Reaches hand into courier and retrieves a metallic egg-shaped item*

name: Birdperson's Voice
line: Greetings, this is Birdperson.

name: Tammy's Voice
line: And Tammy!

name: Birdperson's Voice
line: Inviting you to Planet Squanch for our mate-melding ceremony.

name: Rick
line: (With disgust) Ughhhh... *places a napkin over the hologram and takes it to the bin in the kitchen)

name: Tammy's Voice
line: (Muffled by napkin) If you're not a bird, that means we're getting married!

name: Summer
line: Oh my God! My friend Tammy's marrying Birdperson!

name: Jerry
line: What the hell is a 'Birdperson,'?

name: Morty
line: He's Rick's best friend.

name: Rick
line: Uhhhh, l-l-let's not get carried away, Morty.

name: Courier Flaps
line: Would you like to RSVP or send a gift?

name: Rick
line: No. Weddings are basically funerals with cake. If I wanted to watch someone throw their life away, *belch* I'd hang out with Jerry all day.

name: Courier Flap
line: Affirmative. Returning to sender. *flies towards front door*

name: Beth
line: No, hold on, stay... 'Courier Flaps.'

name: Courier Flap
line: *Turning back around and re-entering dining room* Staying.

name: Beth
line: Dad, you have a friend that's getting married... that's a big deal.

name: Jerry
line: *Scoffs* it's a big deal he has a friend.

name: Rick
line: What do you know about friendship, Jerrrrrry?

name: Courier Flap
line: Confirm, shipping Jerry. *Hovers over Jerry and fully shoves him into underside before flying away through open front door and into sky*

name: Beth
line: Oh God, Jerry?! *Runs to front door*

name: Summer and Morty
line: Dad?! *Follow Beth*

name: Beth
line: *Looking into sky* Where is it taking him?

name: Rick
line: *Still eating cereal* I assume Planet Squanch, 6000 lightyears across the galaxy.

name: Morty
line: Wh?-Wh- th-th-that's insane!

name: Rick
line: Yeah, I know. Now we have to go to the wedding.

name: Squanchy
line: Rick Sanchez, you psycho bag of Squanch!

name: Rick
line: *Unscrewing and drinking from scotch flask* Hey, what's up, Squanchy?

name: Summer and Morty
line: *Morty waves* Heya Squanchy.

name: Squanchy
line: Morty, Summer! And you must be Beth. *kissing Beth's hand* Au squanché.

name: Beth
line: *Holding a suit in a dry cleaning bag* Your language has 'squanch,' in it a lot. Doesn't that become tedious and worn out like the Smurf thing?

name: Rick
line: Beth, Squanchy culture is more... contextual than literal. You just say what's in your squanch and people understand.

name: Beth
line: Oh, okay... I squanch my family.

name: Squanchy
line: Uhh...

name: Beth
line: What? I do, I squanch my family.

name: Squanchy
line: Just stop saying it, gross.

name: Jerry
line: I'm just saying, we keep acting like there's only two options, but there's not. So, yes, if we went back to earth, as long as Rick was out there, they’d want to interrogate us. But, and this is purely hypothetical, what if we turned your father in to the government?

name: Beth
line: Jerry, so help me god, if you ever bring this up again, no more bacon.

name: Jerry
line: There already is no more bacon! This world sucks! Our life sucks! Why are we doing this for someone that would never do anything for anyone but himself?

name: Morty
line: That's not the point, Dad! We love Rick! F-For the most part.

name: Summer
line: Yeah, you don't love people in hopes of a reward, Dad. You love them unconditionally.

name: Beth
line: That's very good, kids. I'm proud of you.

name: Jerry
line: Okay, so let me get this straight. For the rest of your lives, no matter how much it hurts you, no matter how much it destroys our children's futures, we're gonna do whatever Rick wants, whenever he wants?

name: All but Jerry
line: Yes.

name: Jerry
line: WHY?!

name: Beth
line: Because I don't want him to leave again, you dumb asshole!

name: Rick
line: Hey, uh, I was gonna hop over to the Gloppydrop System, get some ice cream.

name: Morty
line: You... You want me to come with? I mean, don't you need my brainwaves for camouflage or something?

name: Rick
line: I'll be okay. Bye, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Rick? You're not leaving, right?

name: Rick
line: Yeah, I am. To get ice cream.

name: Morty
line: So you're coming back?

name: Rick
line: Morty, if you go to where there’s a bunch of ice cream and then you don’t come back, you haven’t actually gotten ice cream, you’ve just gone where ice cream is.

name: Morty
line: Rick, I can handle it if you go, but you'll break mom's heart, and I won't forgive you for that.

name: Rick
line: Where's the van, Morty?

name: Morty
line: It's over the horizon in the driveway.

name: Operator
line: [speaking in an unintelligible language] For English, press 2. [Rick pushes a button.] Connecting to agent.

name: Female Voice
line: Ongoing investigations.

name: Rick
line: Uh, hi. My name is Jerry Smith, I'm from Planet Earth. I know the whereabouts of Rick Sanchez, the wanted criminal.

name: Female Voice
line: Hold on!

name: Gribbles
line: This is Special Agent Gribbles. You have a tip about Rick Sanchez?

name: Rick
line: Yeah, he kidnapped me and my family, and he left us on Dwarf Terrace-9. He said he was gonna go to the Plim Plom Tavern. And listen.

name: Gribbles
line: Yes?

name: Rick
line: I'm doing what's right for the galaxy by calling you, so if we come back to Earth, can my family have a normal life?

name: Gribbles
line: We only want Sanchez, sir. Your family will be fine.

name: Rick
line: Nice, thank you. I'm Jerry Smith, and I enjoy sucking big, sweaty [*bleep*] and licking disgusting furry testicle sacks.

name: Gribbles
line: Uh, okay.
